sentences: SBSTA considered a report on AIJ on Thursday, 24 October.
The Secretariat noted five new AIJ projects, with three in Africa, bringing the total number of projects to 157.
Chair Thorgeirsson said he would prepare draft conclusions.On Tuesday, 29 October, the SBSTA approved the draft conclusions.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
